name: Redis
semantic_context: Get, send and update data in Redis
natural_language_description: 这是 Redis 节点。主要用于: Get, send and update data in Redis

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: info
available_options: Delete (值: delete) - Delete a key from Redis
Get (值: get) - Get the value of a key from Redis
Increment (值: incr) - Atomically increments a key by 1. Creates the key if it does not exist.
Info (值: info) - Returns generic information about the Redis instance
Keys (值: keys) - Returns all the keys matching a pattern
List Length (值: llen) - Returns the length of a list
Pop (值: pop) - Pop data from a redis list
Publish (值: publish) - Publish message to redis channel
Push (值: push) - Push data to a redis list
Set (值: set) - Set the value of a key in redis

key.name: key
key.description: Name of the key to set in Redis
key.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key | 作用: Name of the key to set in Redis | (必填项)

propertyName.name: propertyName
propertyName.description: Optional name of the property to write received data to. Supports dot-notation. Example: "data.person[0].name".
propertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Optional name of the property to write received data to. Supports dot-notation. Example: "data.person[0].name". | 默认值: propertyName

keyType.name: keyType
keyType.description: The type of the key to set
keyType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key Type | 作用: The type of the key to set | 默认值: automatic
available_options: Automatic (值: automatic) - Tries to figure out the type automatically depending on the data
Hash (值: hash) - Data in key is of type 'hash'
List (值: list) - Data in key is of type 'lists'
Sets (值: sets) - Data in key is of type 'sets'
String (值: string) - Data in key is of type 'string'

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: dotNotation (值: None) - By default, dot-notation is used in property names. This means that "a.b" will set the property "b" underneath "a" so { "a": { "b": value} }.If that is not intended this can be deactivated, it will then set { "a.b": value } instead..

expire.name: expire
expire.description: Whether to set a timeout on key
expire.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expire | 作用: Whether to set a timeout on key | 默认值: False

ttl.name: ttl
ttl.description: Number of seconds before key expiration
ttl.natural_language_description: 参数名: TTL | 作用: Number of seconds before key expiration | 默认值: 60

keyPattern.name: keyPattern
keyPattern.description: The key pattern for the keys to return
keyPattern.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key Pattern | 作用: The key pattern for the keys to return | (必填项)

getValues.name: getValues
getValues.description: Whether to get the value of matching keys
getValues.natural_language_description: 参数名: Get Values | 作用: Whether to get the value of matching keys | 默认值: True

list.name: list
list.description: Name of the list in Redis
list.natural_language_description: 参数名: List | 作用: Name of the list in Redis | (必填项)

value.name: value
value.description: The value to write in Redis
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: The value to write in Redis

valueIsJSON.name: valueIsJSON
valueIsJSON.description: Whether the value is JSON or key value pairs
valueIsJSON.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value Is JSON | 作用: Whether the value is JSON or key value pairs | 默认值: True

channel.name: channel
channel.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel | 作用: Channel name | (必填项)

messageData.name: messageData
messageData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data | 作用: Data to push | (必填项)

tail.name: tail
tail.description: Whether to push or pop data from the end of the list
tail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tail | 作用: Whether to push or pop data from the end of the list | 默认值: False
